required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Safety and Tolerability of GX-G6 in Healthy Male Subjects
clinical_study.official_title: A First-in-Human, Single Ascending Dose, Phase 1, Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled Study to Assess the Safety, Tolerability and Pharmacokinetics of Single Subcutaneously Administered GX-G6 in Male Healthy Volunteers.

brief_summary.textblock: This study is a single-center, double-blind, placebo-controlled, phase I study with healthy male subjects receiving ascending single s.c. doses of GX-G6

detailed_description.textblock: A screening examination will be performed within 28 days prior to dosing. Eligible subjects will return to the study center in the morning of Day -1 and will remain in-patient until discharge about 98 hours after dosing (after oral glucose tolerance test in the morning of Day 5) if there are no safety issues. The s.c. injection will be administered in the morning of Day 1. Ambulatory visits will take place on Days 7, 9 and 12. A follow-up visit will take place on Day 15 and a final visit on Day 28.

primary_outcome.measure: Incidence, nature and severity of Adverse events
primary_outcome.description: All safety data will be evaluated descriptively

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-dose and 24, 48, 72, 96, 144, 192, 264 and 336 hours after dosing
secondary_outcome.description: Oral glucose tolerance test in mol/L

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-dose and 24, 48, 72, 96, 144, 192, 264 and 336 hours after dosing

arm_group.description: Single administration of pre-determined dose (Level I) GX-G6 (6 subjects) and pre-determined dose (Level I) placebo (2 subjects)
Single administration of pre-determined dose (Level II) GX-G6 (6 subjects) and pre-determined dose (Level II) placebo (2 subjects)
Single administration of pre-determined dose (Level III) GX-G6 (6 subjects) and pre-determined dose (Level III) placebo (2 subjects)
Single administration of pre-determined dose (Level IV) GX-G6 (6 subjects) and pre-determined dose (Level IV) placebo (2 subjects)
Single administration of pre-determined dose (Level V) GX-G6 (6 subjects) and pre-determined dose (Level V) placebo (2 subjects)
Single administration of pre-determined dose (Level VI) GX-G6 (6 subjects) and pre-determined dose (Level VI) placebo (2 subjects)

intervention.description: Each subject will receive a single dose of either GX-G6 or placebo in randomized fashion.
Each subject will receive a single dose of either GX-G6 or placebo in randomized fashion.
